channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: "My Mom Almost Died From It": 21 Common Medical Conditions That Can Be Much, Much More Serious Than You Think

item.title: Search for a woman who got off a cruise ship in Alaska to hike and didn't return
item.description: Authorities say a woman visiting Alaska’s capital city on a cruise ship did not return from a hike she said she was taking

item.title: Skydiving plane goes off NJ runway, crashes into woods, sending 15 to hospital
item.description: A skydiving plane carrying 15 people has crashed near an airport in southern New Jersey after reporting engine trouble

item.title: Shooting in Chicago wounds multiple people, police say
item.description: Police say four people have died from gunshot wounds and 14 others have been hospitalized following a drive-by shooting in Chicago
